sorts

Class QuickSort

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorts.QuickSort

  • public final class QuickSort
extends java.lang.Object
    QuickSort class is a utility class and contains all the methods required for 4 different QuickSorts.
    Author:
    Wesley

      • quickSort

        private static void quickSort(int start,
                              int end)
        Recursive QuickSort method used by quickSort(int[] array).

        This code is modified code from void sort(int arr[], int low, int high) obtained from http://www.geeksforgeeks.org/quick-sort/

        Original author: Rajat Mishra

        Parameters:
        start - beginning of list
        end - last element of the list

      • quickSort

        private static void quickSort(int start,
                              int end,
                              int stopSize)
        Recursive QuickSort method used by the quicksorts with 50 and 100 limit partitions. Switches to insertion sort when the limit is reached.
        Parameters:
        start - beginning of list
        end - end of list
        stopSize - partition min limit

      • quickSortMed3

        private static void quickSortMed3(int start,
                                  int end)
        Recursive QuickSort method used by quickSortMed3(int[] array). Calculates the median of 3 numbers as the pivot.
        Parameters:
        start - begining of list
        end - last element of list

      • partition

        private static int partition(int start,
                             int end)
        The partition method puts the pivot in the correct position in the array. It moves all elements smaller than the pivot before the pivot and all elements larger than the pivot after the pivot.

        This code is modified code from function int partition(int arr[], int low, int high) obtained from http://www.geeksforgeeks.org/quick-sort/

        Original author: Rajat Mishra

        Parameters:
        start - beginning of sublist
        end - end of sublist
        Returns:
        the index of the pivot

      • exchange

        private static void exchange(int i,
                             int j)
        Switches 2 elements in the array
        Parameters:
        i - first element to switch
        j - second element to switch

      • insertionSort

        private static void insertionSort(int start,
                                  int end)
        Performs an insertion sort
        Parameters:
        start - beginning of elements to sort
        end - last element to sort

      • medianOfThree

        private static int medianOfThree(int i,
                                 int j,
                                 int k)
        Determines the median of 3 numbers.
        Parameters:
        i - first number
        j - second number
        k - third number
        Returns:
        The median of the 3 input numbers.
